summary: Set in the frozen steppes of Mongolia, a young nomad confronted with his destiny after animals fall victim to a plague which threatens to eradicate nomadism.
cast: Batzul Khayankhyarvaa|Tsetsegee Byamba|Banzar Damchaa|Tserendarizav Dashnyam|Dugarsuren Dagvadorj|Uuriintuya Enkhtaivan|Otgontogos Namsrai|Gereisukh Otgon|Bat-Erdene Damdinsuren
director: Directors: Peter Brosens, Jessica Woodworth (as Jessica Hope Woodworth)
title: Khadak
